description: Whether you're booting up below a desert tower, getting pumped at the sport crag, or stacking pads below your project, the Rogue Pursuit™ 1/4 Zip always makes it into the pack. This technical stretch top insulates, wicks moisture and keeps you comfortable no matter the climb or the climate.
name: Mountain Hardwear Rogue Pursuit 1/4 Zip - Mens
